entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 4:21PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LONG DURATION PRECIPITATION EVENT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... A series of surface fronts will impact parts of Southcentral throughout the next few days. The precipitation begins along the eastern Kenai Peninsula this afternoon and will spread northeastward to western Prince William Sound later today.
